mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WDM.AX_SKILL_FACTOR (colname, hanname, seq, use_yn, gubun, type, dispname, stype, sgroup, asname, interval) VALUES (#{colname}, #{hanname}, #{seq}, #{use_yn}, #{gubun}, #{type}, #{dispname}, #{stype}, '-', #{asname}, #{interval})

INSERT INTO WDM.AX_AGENT_FACTOR (colname, hanname, seq, use_yn, gubun, type, dispname, stype, sgroup, asname, interval) VALUES (#{colname}, #{hanname}, #{seq}, #{use_yn}, #{gubun}, #{type}, #{dispname}, #{stype}, '-', #{asname}, #{interval})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_CD AS USER_CD FROM AX_USER_M ORDER BY USER_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WDM.AX_USER_FACTOR (user_id, user_group, stat_gubun, stat_seq, stat_yn, sort, dispname) VALUES (#{user_cd}, 'SYSTEM_ACCESS', #{stat_gubun}, #{stat_seq}, #{stat_yn}, #{stat_seq}, #{dispname})
mapper.select: SELECT A1.USER_CD AS user_cd, A2.GRP_AUTH_CD AS grp_auth_cd, A1.COMPANY_CD as company_cd, A3.SORT as sort FROM AX_USER_M A1, AX_USER_AUTH_M A2, AX_COMMON_CODE_M A3 where a1.user_cd = a2.user_cd AND a2.GRP_AUTH_CD = a3.code AND a3.group_cd = 'AUTH_GROUP' AND a1.user_cd = #{user_cd} order by user_cd
